title: This Needs To Be The New Ahri Splash
body:
I know that Ahri's splash was updated a while back, but this splash truly matches her personality. Mischievous and young (don't you perverts even think about it). And at least Ahri's lines will match the splash art as well. When you listen to her voice lines and then look at the actual splash art, it doesn't match that well. If you think we should have this as the new Ahri splash, vote this thread up!

As for the creator of the splash, it is Knockwurst.

EDIT: Thanks so much for the support on this. I just expected this post to be in the dust like every other one, but this now has over 2k views and is the most hottest thing right now in Community Creations and has over 300 votes! Now let's try getting this post noticed by a Rioter! :D

Do you call Succubus in general slutty?
Yawn. Seductive =/= slutty. And Succubi are different from Ahri in terms of character type.

Well, seductresses are practiced seducers. And since seduction is "the process of deliberately enticing a person, to lead astray, as from duty, rectitude, or the like; **to corrupt, to persuade or induce to engage in sexual behavior**" it kinda does fit. And then there's this line "One traditional view portrays the femme fatale (or, you know, seductress in a movie term) as a **sexual vampire**; her **charms leech the virility** and independence of lovers, leaving them shells of themselves." Ahri eats the life force of her victims...sounds similar to me. And, my final quote of the night "In modern representations, a succubus may or may not appear in dreams and is **often depicted as a highly attractive seductress or enchantress**. So you know, strike three, you're out. Ahri is, for all intents and purposes, a succubus. She isn't one of the completely naked ones that appear in other places, so I guess she is a slightly more PG version, but still.

I think that the interpretations and connections you draw from the above quotes are arbitrary. The connections are quite vague, but it doesn't matter since it's not what my point is about. (I don't agree that Ahri is a succubus in the standard sense, but never mind.)

The main point that I maintain is that seductive =/= slutty. I'm fairly sure that her right tit doesn't need to be -physically- and -visibly- flattened by the top she's wearing for her to be seductive. I'm also fairly certain that the design of her skirt need not be altered in the splash compared to the model just to show some butt. It's just bad female character design that I personally could never take seriously if it became the official splash.
